name: Dash X
description:
Dash X  is a mini prototype game that only need one hand, 2 eyes and maybe your ear to enjoy some music while playing.

All you need to do is just to tap on your phone screen to dash to the next shape pad through the same color and same shape to get a score.

Passing through wrong shape or wrong color will make you lose, and you need to start again.

Please note that the game is just a prototype and everything here may be subject to change.

Please note the apk file contains ads as i want to know how useful ads vs paid version.
